endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.description: When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic

parameters.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic

parameters.name: max_new_tokens

param_schema.title: Max New Tokens
param_schema.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens

parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens
